member.name: M:FSH.WebApi.Infrastructure.Auth.AzureAd.AzureAdJwtBearerEvents.TokenValidated(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.TokenValidatedContext)
member.summary: This method contains the logic that validates the user's tenant and normalizes claims.

member.name: M:FSH.WebApi.Infrastructure.Common.Extensions.PathExtensions.ResolvePath(System.String)
member.summary: Resolves relative segments in a path.

member.name: M:FSH.WebApi.Infrastructure.Identity.UserService.GetOrCreateFromPrincipalAsync(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: This is used when authenticating with AzureAd. The local user is retrieved using the objectidentifier claim present in the ClaimsPrincipal. If no such claim is found, an InternalServerException is thrown. If no user is found with that ObjectId, a new one is created and populated with the values from the ClaimsPrincipal. If a role claim is present in the principal, and the user is not yet in that roll, then the user is added to that role.

member.name: T:FSH.WebApi.Infrastructure.Localization.FSHPoFileLocationProvider
member.summary: Provides PO files for FSH Localization.

member.name: P:FSH.WebApi.Infrastructure.Multitenancy.FSHTenantInfo.Id
member.summary: The actual TenantId, which is also used in the TenantId shadow property on the multitenant entities.

member.name: P:FSH.WebApi.Infrastructure.Multitenancy.FSHTenantInfo.Identifier
member.summary: The identifier that is used in headers/routes/querystrings. This is set to the same as Id to avoid confusion.

member.name: P:FSH.WebApi.Infrastructure.Multitenancy.FSHTenantInfo.Issuer
member.summary: Used by AzureAd Authorization to store the AzureAd Tenant Issuer to map against.

member.name: T:FSH.WebApi.Infrastructure.OpenApi.SwaggerGlobalAuthProcessor
member.summary: The default NSwag AspNetCoreOperationProcessor doesn't take .RequireAuthorization() calls into account Unless the AllowAnonymous attribute is defined, this processor will always add the security scheme when it's not already there, so effectively adding "Global Auth".

member.name: T:FSH.WebApi.Infrastructure.Persistence.Repository.EventAddingRepositoryDecorator`1
member.summary: The repository that implements IRepositoryWithEvents. Implemented as a decorator. It only augments the Add, Update and Delete calls where it adds the respective EntityCreated, EntityUpdated or EntityDeleted event before delegating to the decorated repository.
